title: Morning Routine on Zen Dairy Goats Farm

subtasks: Waking up and preparing for milking
Observing the cows (Bernie and Maisie) and ensuring they are ready
Greeting the cows
Leading the cows to the milking area
Preparing warm water and washcloth for cleaning
Cleaning the cow's udder area to remove dirt and germs
Drying the cow's udder area with a clean towel
Using a milking cup to extract milk
Collecting and measuring the remaining milk production
Ensuring milking is thorough to avoid leaks
